text: Beyonce is completely unbothered by Wendy Williams ’ auto - tone diss, and we ’ ve got EXCLUSIVE details on why she wants to challenge the talk show host to a sing - off. Wendy Williams certainly should have thought twice before coming for Beyonce, 36. After hearing Wendy slam her vocal skills on Feb. 20, Queen Bey is ready to set the record straight. “ If Beyonce really worried about what Wendy Williams said then Beyonce would not be Beyonce. She is so far above that chatter. She just had to laugh it off. But, if Wendy ever wanted to put her money where her mouth is she would welcome a sing - off between the two to show who can really sing, and who is just a big bag of hot air! ” a source
